name: Reduce Reuse Recycle Unisex Fine Jersey Tee. 100% Organic Cotton, Sustainable Edition
description: Every little bit counts! Recycle that plastic bottle you picked up at the gas station, or better yet carry around a reusable BPA free bottle! If you have to take your car out, try to reduce your gas consumption and consolidate your trips to most/all at once. Reduce your carbon footprint, reuse the products you buy as much as possible, and recycle everything you can! Don't forget to bike more, drive less, and shop at your local farmer's market! This design is printed on our American Apparel Sustainable Edition, 100% USDA certified organic cotton, fine jersey short sleeve tees! Available in Dijon, White, Natural, Galaxy, and Cinder. Click here for directions on how to specify your shirt color and how to send us any notes on your order! This print is hand screened with our eco friendly green ink. That means you won't feel a horrible plastic print on your shirt. In fact, you won't feel the print much at all after a wash or two! All shirts are hand screened (there may be slight variations in prints). All of our shirts are machine washable in cold water. Ultra comfy American Apparel Unisex Fine Jersey Short Sleeve Tee! The softest, smoothest, best-looking T-shirt available anywhere! This shirt is 100% made and printed in the USA! Sweatshop Free! Made of 100% USDA certified organic fine ring-spun combed cotton, exceptionally smooth and tight-knit. Please allow 4 to 6 days for production on these shirts AND 2 to 5 days for shipping (business days). They are all printed when you place your order (super fresh)! Shirt Specs: • 100% Fine Jersey cotton construction • Durable rib neckband • Unisex size – *women may prefer to order one size smaller • Fabric weight 4.3 oz/yd² (146 g/m²) • Available shirt sizes: XSmall through XXXL. * Due to variations in monitors please remember, the shirt & ink color will not be exactly what you see on your computer screen. Be sure to check out our FAQs page before ordering, if you have any questions send us a quick email! When you order please specify your size or sizes if you order more than one! Click here for directions on how to specify your shirt color and how to send us any notes on your order! Shipping will be via USPS first class out of the Dallas, Texas area..
